meanings.definition: A man who serves as a sponsor for a child at baptism.
meanings.sent1: At the baptism, the godfather promised to guide the child in life.
meanings.sent2: The godfather stood proudly beside the child during the baptism ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The godfather jokingly told the child, 'I'll be your guardian angel!'
meanings.sent4: He was like a godfather to the young boy, always offering wise advice.
meanings.sent5: The godfather's role is to provide support and mentorship to the child.

meanings.definition: A man who is influential or revered in a particular sphere.
meanings.sent1: In the business world, he was known as the godfather of innovation.
meanings.sent2: The music industry regarded him as a godfather of rock and roll.
meanings.sent3: Everyone sought advice from the godfather of wisdom in the community.
meanings.sent4: He was like the godfather of style, setting trends effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The godfather of the industry was respected by all for his leadership.
